## Featured Projects

Here you'll find a collection of my data science and statistics projects. Each project demonstrates different analytical skills and techniques.

### Baseball Analytics Dashboard

[View Project](/projects/project1.qmd)

This interactive dashboard analyzes MLB player performance metrics using R Shiny. The project includes:

- Statistical analysis of batting averages across seasons
- Predictive modeling for player performance
- Interactive visualizations of team statistics
- Comparative analysis of player metrics

**Technologies used:** R, Shiny, ggplot2, dplyr

### Predictive Modeling for Stock Prices

[View Project](#) <!-- Add actual link when available -->

A machine learning approach to predict stock price movements based on historical data and market indicators:

- Time series analysis of market trends
- Feature engineering from financial indicators
- Implementation of LSTM neural networks
- Backtesting and model evaluation

**Technologies used:** Python, TensorFlow, Pandas, NumPy
